cast.name: 华金·科尔德罗 Joaquín Cordero
佩德罗·费尔南德斯 Pedro Fernández

introduction: From Amazon:Witness this beautiful story of young love, starring Pedrito Fernandez as Ferco, a care free young man in love with Rosalba, the most beautiful and popular girl in school, who doesn’t notice him because she’s in love with Rafael, the coach of the baseball team. In the meantime, Usi, a very small girl with braces and glasses who is seen as insignificant by the entire school, carries a torch for Ferco and will do anything he asks. After becoming disillusioned with Rafael, Rosalba starts to notice Ferco. Will Ferco stay with Rosalba, or will Usi triumph, despite her bottle lensed glasses? Don't miss the story that will transport you back to the days of your first love.
